name: todo_log
ddl: CREATE TABLE todo_log (_id CHAR (20) PRIMARY KEY, conn_task_id CHAR (20), todo_desc TEXT, status INT (8) DEFAULT (0), on_pending BOOLEAN DEFAULT (0), pending_till_date DATE, is_critical BOOLEAN DEFAULT (0), conclusion_desc TEXT, waiting_desc TEXT, create_time DATETIME, destroyed BOOLEAN DEFAULT (0), inter_order_weight INTEGER (8) DEFAULT (0), conn_project_id VARCHAR (20), conn_company_id VARCHAR, officejob_type VARCHAR (2));
